snippet: The concert “Brazilian Explorative Music,” on Monday, featured players who put fresh spins on the region’s art forms.
lead_paragraph: The concert “Brazilian Explorative Music,” on Monday, featured players who put fresh spins on the region’s art forms.

headline.seo: ‘Brazilian Explorative Music,’ a Concert of Experimentation
headline.main: Taking Brazil’s Rhythms and Stretching Them Out
headline.print_headline: Taking Brazil’s Rhythms and Stretching Them Out
